name: Desert Crazy Bus
description:
For a browser version please visit:

https://gamejolt.com/games/DesertCrazyBus/298846

Try to make it to your destination without being pulled over from bandits who want to steal your precious Vegas winnings. Watch out, the road is long and can be tiresome, pick up any energy drink cans to stay awake, or just take a quick nap - but beware, the Nevada desert is vast and may contain things not of this world.

Controls:

Left/Right, A/D - Movement

Spacebar - Horn
